modName: Hentai Void Armor Cold Shoulder Version for UNP
summary:
HENTAI Void Cold Shoulder armor with slider Now fully upgradeable and ENCHANTABLE boots and gloves! Also Increased armor rating and value.
WARNING: IF YOU HAVE ZOTMAN12'S HENTAI VOID ARMOR INSTALLED, THIS WILL OVERWRITE THAT MOD! (See Long description and readme)
Void armor by Hentai - Nexus Exclusive -,brought to us in Skyr
descriptionHtml:
[{ QUESTIONS? SUGGESTIONS? WANT TO OFFER ME SOME FREE 3D MODELLING LESSONS? (Hopefully you answered yes to the last one, lol) If you answered yes to any of those questions then PM me because I, very likely, will not see your comments. }]

HENTAI Void Cold Shoulder armor with slider Now fully upgradeable and ENCHANTABLE boots and gloves! Also Increased armor rating and value.

Void armor by Hentai - Nexus Exclusive -,brought to us in Skyrim by zotman12 now works with full range slider of Main UNP body.
Now without shoulderpads and with increased armor rating and value and now enchantable boots and gloves in this, my "Cold Shoulder" version.
Craftable at any forge.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
UNP BODY REQUIRED!!!!
WARNING: IF YOU HAVE ZOTMAN12'S HENTAI VOID ARMOR INSTALLED, THIS WILL OVERWRITE THAT MOD!
IF YOU WANT VOID ARMOR WITH SHOULDERPADS GET THE ORIGINAL AT THIS LINK:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11871
IF YOU WANT IT WITHOUT SHOULDERPADS, and with increased armor rating and value and enchantable boots and gloves, USE THIS ONE (VOID COLD SHOULDER)
So far, because I'm a noob and don't know how to do it, you can't have both, I'm quite sorry.
NMM should work but I haven't tested.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Known issues: dimon99 only refit body armor, all I did was remove the shoulderpads, increase armor rating and value and make the boots and gloves enchantable, boots still will clip if not used with Void Cold Shoulder or original body armorpiece. For me it's not a biggie,if it's for you -get your rear end in 3D App and fix it :)
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Credits and thanks:
dimon99 - for the UNP body and the weight slider fix.
Hentai - the author,the creator
zotman12 - quality conversion of original Oblivion armor to Skyrim,thanks for bringing good stuff :)
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Permissions
==========
1. Feel free to use everything in this file.

2. Everything I made for Obliviion is free to convert to Skyrim. Since Im not going to convert them myself.

3. Do not upload this file on Steam Workshop until furthur notice. ( I like Nexus so much more as a modder)


Hentai Works
========
Type "Hentai" at the SkyNexus search tab
